component.name: wxMaxima
component.summary: A graphical user interface for maxima being a powerful computer algebra system

description.p: wxMaxima is a full-featured user-interface for Maxima, a program that solves mathematical problems by manipulating equations (and outputting the resulting formula), instead of just calculating a number.
